creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: One-panel huipil; round neckline; brown warp? with yellow vertical stripes, red warp-faced; geometric designs, horizontal and vertical zigzags, in purple, green, blue and yellow, brocaded in the two-faced brocading technique; 4 selvedge ends; collar made of crochet cotton.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
